paper.title: Design/CPN - A Computer Tool for Coloured Petri Nets
paper.venue: Tools and Algorithms for Construction and Analysis of Systems
paper.abstract: In this paper, we describe the computer tool Design/CPN supporting editing, simulation, and state space analysis of Coloured Petri Nets. So far, approximately 40 man-years have been invested in the development of Design/CPN. It is used world-wide by more than 200 companies and research institutions. For the presentation, we draw from the experiences gained in a recent industrial application using Coloured Petri Nets in the design, validation, and verification of communication protocols for audio/video systems.
